definition[0]: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart
example[0]: She held out her left hand.
example[1]: a scar on the left side of his face
definition[1]: on the same side of something as your left side
example[3]: the left bank of the river
example[4]: a pile of papers on the left side of the desk
definition[2]: towards the direction or side that is on the left
example[5]: Turn left just after the school.
definition[3]: a hit made with your left hand
definition[4]: the past tense and past participle of leave1
